comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model MeasurementDeviceLocation adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/MeasurementDeviceLocation/schema.json
